comments.author: terepin64@gmail.com
comments.creator: terepin64@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/4.0b13pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/4.0b13pre

This meta bug will track all old GUIs in Firefox 4+. Some of 'em will be converted into ICUI, some into DH and some just need graphics upgrade.

Please note that these changes require a lot of time, so this meta bug isn't intended for concrete milestone.

Reproducible: Always
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/4.0b13pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/4.0b13pre

This meta bug will track all old GUIs in Firefox 4+. Some of 'em will be converted into ICUI, some into DH and some just need graphics upgrade.

Please note that these changes require a lot of time, so this meta bug isn't intended for concrete milestone.

Reproducible: Always

What is DH?

Also, the title reads very badly, "[meta] Get rid of old GUI leftovers from UI" should perhaps be "[meta] Removal of defunct UI from pre-Firefox 4". Not sure why this bug is needed as it could've been tracked by the refresh bugs, but the title could certainly be fixed.
comments.raw_text:
What is DH?

Also, the title reads very badly, "[meta] Get rid of old GUI leftovers from UI" should perhaps be "[meta] Removal of defunct UI from pre-Firefox 4". Not sure why this bug is needed as it could've been tracked by the refresh bugs, but the title could certainly be fixed.

comments.raw_text:
DH -> Doorhanger

Purpose of this meta bug is to track bugs that will remove old GUI and UI elements from pre-Firefox 4 era. Title changed as requested, thanks for input!

asmodeusme@yahoo.com
comments.text:
Sorry if posted on the wrong place but not sure about the right place

The new Download panel has loads of free chrome above & below the progress bar
why can't we use the space to provide more detail's like Speed?(which was recently removed but is very useful)
or more options like auto-clear check box or url -info?

Also there is no compact mode(if user want's to see more download in less space) mode in default large icons or using small icons

comments.author: sebastianzartner@gmail.com
comments.text:
I'm not a Mozilla member but this is definitely not the right place to post this.
It is about removing old GUI from current Firefox.

I saw you also posted your request to bug 564934, which is marked as meta-issue for all the things to do for the new Download Manager UI. I guess what you should do instead is to create one (or more) new issue(s) for your suggestions and refer to 564934 in the description. So it/they can be marked as blocking that one.

Sebastian
comments.raw_text:
